words.definition: The point or place where something begins
Producing powerful and clear images in the mind
Calm and peaceful
A small broken piece of something
A formal public event
The ability to understand others' feelings
To keep something going or maintain it over time
Cultural traditions passed from past generations
A strong desire to achieve something

Very beautiful or impressive
A new idea, method, or invention
